inlineScript: function onApply(game, parent) { var effect = parent.createEffect(); effect.getBonuses().add('DualWieldTraining'); parent.applyEffect(effect); }
name: Dual Wielding
description: You are able to use two one handed or light weapons at once, albeit at a substantial penalty to attack and damage.  The attack penalty is less if you use a light weapon such as a short sword of handaxe in the off hand.
